name: noncesense
description: Blockchain-based certificate validation dApp replacing centralized CA trust

scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/All.ts --network localhost && node -e "const artifact = require('./artifacts/contracts/Certificates.sol/Certificates.json'); const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('../web/src/contracts/Certificates.json', JSON.stringify(artifact.abi, null, 2));" && cp ignition/deployments/chain-31337/deployed_addresses.json ../web/src/contracts/deployed_addresses.json
scripts.deploy:local:counter: cd contracts && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Counter.ts --network localhost && cp ignition/deployments/chain-31337/deployed_addresses.json ../web/src/contracts/deployed_addresses.json
scripts.deploy:local:certificates: cd contracts && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Certificates.ts --network localhost && node -e "const artifact = require('./artifacts/contracts/Certificates.sol/Certificates.json'); const fs = require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('../web/src/contracts/Certificates.json', JSON.stringify(artifact.abi, null, 2));" && cp ignition/deployments/chain-31337/deployed_addresses.json ../web/src/contracts/deployed_addresses.json
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter nonce-sense clean && cd contracts && npx hardhat clean

author: Daniel Agafonov, Brynn Crowley, Marcos Pantoja
